
# ==============================================================================
# Overflow Hexadecimal

# UINT64_MAX(18446744073709551615) +1, +2, +3 ...

0x10000000000000000
0x10000000000000001
0x10000000000000002
0x1000000000000000D
0x1000000000000000E
0x1000000000000000F

0xF0000000000000000
0xF0000000000000001
0xF0000000000000002
0xF000000000000000D
0xF000000000000000E
0xF000000000000000F

0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

+0x10000000000000000
+0x10000000000000001
+0x10000000000000002
+0x1000000000000000D
+0x1000000000000000E
+0x1000000000000000F

+0xF0000000000000000
+0xF0000000000000001
+0xF0000000000000002
+0xF000000000000000D
+0xF000000000000000E
+0xF000000000000000F

+0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF


# INT64_MIN(-9223372036854775808) -1, -2, -3, ...

-0x8000000000000001
-0x8000000000000002
-0x8000000000000003

-0x800000000000000D
-0x800000000000000E
-0x800000000000000F

-0xF000000000000000
-0xF000000000000001
-0xF000000000000002
-0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

-0x80000000000000000
-0x80000000000000001
-0x80000000000000002
-0x80000000000000003
